short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ITZY Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD ITZY background. ITZY wallpaper background theme for K-pop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shows ITZY wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Choose a random ITZY background or set your favorite via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Displays the current date and time automatically.
6. Note feature for jotting down your tasks.
7. Quick link to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add sites to your Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Quick link to explore more themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Instant access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic weather effects like snow, rain, leaves, and fireworks on your ITZY tab.
